card.name: Abomination of Llanowar
card.text: Vigilance; menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.) Abomination of Llanowar's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Elves you control plus the number of Elf cards in your graveyard.

card.name: Ambition's Cost
card.text: You draw three cards and you lose 3 life.

card.name: Angel of Finality
card.text: Flying When Angel of Finality enters the battlefield, exile all cards from target player's graveyard.

card.name: Angel of Serenity
card.text: Flying When Angel of Serenity enters the battlefield, you may exile up to three other target creatures from the battlefield and/or creature cards from graveyards. When Angel of Serenity leaves the battlefield, return the exiled cards to their owners' hands.

card.name: Arcane Artisan
card.text: {2}{U}, {T}: Target player draws a card, then exiles a card from their hand. If a creature card is exiled this way, that player creates a token that's a copy of that card. When Arcane Artisan leaves the battlefield, exile all tokens created with it at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Arcane Signet
card.text: {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.

card.name: Azorius Chancery
card.text: Azorius Chancery enters the battlefield tapped. When Azorius Chancery enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand. {T}: Add {W}{U}.

card.name: Azorius Guildgate
card.text: Azorius Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {W} or {U}.

card.name: Banishing Light
card.text: When Banishing Light enters the battlefield, exile target nonland permanent an opponent controls until Banishing Light leaves the battlefield.

card.name: Beast Whisperer
card.text: Whenever you cast a creature spell, draw a card.

card.name: Bounty of Skemfar
card.text: Reveal the top six cards of your library. You may put a land card from among them onto the battlefield tapped and an Elf card from among them into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

card.name: Brago, King Eternal
card.text: Flying Whenever Brago, King Eternal deals combat damage to a player, exile any number of target nonland permanents you control, then return those cards to the battlefield under their owner's control.

card.name: Burnished Hart
card.text: {3}, Sacrifice Burnished Hart: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Casualties of War
card.text: Choose one or more — • Destroy target artifact. • Destroy target creature. • Destroy target enchantment. • Destroy target land. • Destroy target planeswalker.

card.name: Cleansing Nova
card.text: Choose one — • Destroy all creatures. • Destroy all artifacts and enchantments.

card.name: Cloudblazer
card.text: Flying When Cloudblazer enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life and draw two cards.

card.name: Cloudgoat Ranger
card.text: When Cloudgoat Ranger enters the battlefield, create three 1/1 white Kithkin Soldier creature tokens. Tap three untapped Kithkin you control: Cloudgoat Ranger gets +2/+0 and gains flying until end of turn.

card.name: Command Tower
card.text: {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.

card.name: Commander's Sphere
card.text: {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity. Sacrifice Commander's Sphere: Draw a card.

card.name: Cosmic Intervention
card.text: If a permanent you control would be put into a graveyard from the battlefield this turn, exile it instead. Return it to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step. Foretell {1}{W} (During your turn, you may pay {2} and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)

card.name: Crown of Skemfar
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each Elf you control and has reach. {2}{G}: Return Crown of Skemfar from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Cryptic Caves
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Cryptic Caves: Draw a card. Activate this ability only if you control five or more lands.

card.name: Cultivator of Blades
card.text: Fabricate 2 (When this creature enters the battlefield, put two +1/+1 counters on it or create two 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature tokens.) Whenever Cultivator of Blades attacks, you may have other attacking creatures get +X/+X until end of turn, where X is Cultivator of Blades's power.

card.name: Curse of the Swine
card.text: Exile X target creatures. For each creature exiled this way, its controller creates a 2/2 green Boar creature token.

card.name: Day of the Dragons
card.text: When Day of the Dragons enters the battlefield, exile all creatures you control. Then create that many 5/5 red Dragon creature tokens with flying. When Day of the Dragons leaves the battlefield, sacrifice all Dragons you control. Then return the exiled cards to the battlefield under your control.

card.name: Dwynen, Gilt-Leaf Daen
card.text: Reach Other Elf creatures you control get +1/+1. Whenever Dwynen, Gilt-Leaf Daen attacks, you gain 1 life for each attacking Elf you control.

card.name: Eerie Interlude
card.text: Exile any number of target creatures you control. Return those cards to the battlefield under their owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Elderfang Venom
card.text: Attacking Elves you control have deathtouch. Whenever an Elf you control dies, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

card.name: Elvish Archdruid
card.text: Other Elf creatures you control get +1/+1. {T}: Add {G} for each Elf you control.

card.name: Elvish Mystic
card.text: {T}: Add {G}.

card.name: Elvish Promenade
card.text: Create a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token for each Elf you control.

card.name: Elvish Rejuvenator
card.text: When Elvish Rejuvenator enters the battlefield, look at the top five cards of your library. You may put a land card from among them onto the battlefield tapped. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

card.name: Empyrean Eagle
card.text: Flying Other creatures you control with flying get +1/+1.

card.name: End-Raze Forerunners
card.text: Vigilance, trample, haste When End-Raze Forerunners enters the battlefield, other creatures you control get +2/+2 and gain vigilance and trample until end of turn.

card.name: Ethereal Valkyrie
card.text: Flying Whenever Ethereal Valkyrie enters the battlefield or attacks, draw a card, then exile a card from your hand face down. It becomes foretold. Its foretell cost is its mana cost reduced by {2}. (On a later turn, you may cast it for its foretell cost, even if this creature has left the battlefield.)

card.name: Evangel of Heliod
card.text: When Evangel of Heliod enters the battlefield, create a number of 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens equal to your devotion to white. (Each {W} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to white.)

card.name: Eyeblight Cullers
card.text: When Eyeblight Cullers dies, create three 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature tokens, then mill three cards. (Put the top three cards of your library into your graveyard.)

card.name: Eyeblight Massacre
card.text: Non-Elf creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn.

card.name: Farhaven Elf
card.text: When Farhaven Elf enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Flickerwisp
card.text: Flying When Flickerwisp enters the battlefield, exile another target permanent. Return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Foul Orchard
card.text: Foul Orchard enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {B} or {G}.

card.name: Geist-Honored Monk
card.text: Vigilance Geist-Honored Monk's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creatures you control. When Geist-Honored Monk enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens with flying.

card.name: Ghostly Flicker
card.text: Exile two target artifacts, creatures, and/or lands you control, then return those cards to the battlefield under your control.

card.name: Ghostly Prison
card.text: Creatures can't attack you unless their controller pays {2} for each creature they control that's attacking you.

card.name: Goldnight Commander
card.text: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Golgari Findbroker
card.text: When Golgari Findbroker enters the battlefield, return target permanent card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Golgari Guildgate
card.text: Golgari Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {B} or {G}.

card.name: Golgari Rot Farm
card.text: Golgari Rot Farm enters the battlefield tapped. When Golgari Rot Farm enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand. {T}: Add {B}{G}.

card.name: Harvest Season
card.text: Search your library for up to X basic land cards, where X is the number of tapped creatures you control, and put those cards onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Hero of Bretagard
card.text: Whenever you exile one or more cards from your hand and/or permanents from the battlefield, put that many +1/+1 counters on Hero of Bretagard. As long as Hero of Bretagard has five or more counters on it, it has flying and is an Angel in addition to its other types. As long as Hero of Bretagard has ten or more counters on it, it has indestructible and is a God in addition to its other types.

card.name: Imperious Perfect
card.text: Other Elves you control get +1/+1. {G}, {T}: Create a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token.

card.name: Inspired Sphinx
card.text: Flying When Inspired Sphinx enters the battlefield, draw cards equal to the number of opponents you have. {3}{U}: Create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying.

card.name: Jagged-Scar Archers
card.text: Jagged-Scar Archers's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Elves you control. {T}: Jagged-Scar Archers deals damage equal to its power to target creature with flying.

card.name: Jungle Hollow
card.text: Jungle Hollow enters the battlefield tapped. When Jungle Hollow enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life. {T}: Add {B} or {G}.

card.name: Kor Cartographer
card.text: When Kor Cartographer enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a Plains card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Lathril, Blade of the Elves
card.text: Menace Whenever Lathril, Blade of the Elves deals combat damage to a player, create that many 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature tokens. {T}, Tap ten untapped Elves you control: Each opponent loses 10 life and you gain 10 life.

card.name: Llanowar Tribe
card.text: {T}: Add {G}{G}{G}.

card.name: Lys Alana Huntmaster
card.text: Whenever you cast an Elf spell, you may create a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token.

card.name: Lys Alana Scarblade
card.text: {T}, Discard an Elf card: Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of Elves you control.

card.name: Marble Diamond
card.text: Marble Diamond enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {W}.

card.name: Marshal's Anthem
card.text: Multikicker {1}{W} (You may pay an additional {1}{W} any number of times as you cast this spell.) Creatures you control get +1/+1. When Marshal's Anthem enters the battlefield, return up to X target creature cards from your graveyard to the battlefield, where X is the number of times Marshal's Anthem was kicked.

card.name: Marwyn, the Nurturer
card.text: Whenever another Elf enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Marwyn, the Nurturer. {T}: Add an amount of {G} equal to Marwyn's power.

card.name: Masked Admirers
card.text: When Masked Admirers enters the battlefield, draw a card. Whenever you cast a creature spell, you may pay {G}{G}. If you do, return Masked Admirers from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Meandering River
card.text: Meandering River enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {W} or {U}.

card.name: Meteor Golem
card.text: When Meteor Golem enters the battlefield, destroy target nonland permanent an opponent controls.

card.name: Miara, Thorn of the Glade
card.text: Whenever Miara, Thorn of the Glade or another Elf you control dies, you may pay {1} and 1 life. If you do, draw a card. Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)

card.name: Migratory Route
card.text: Create four 1/1 white Bird creature tokens with flying. Basic landcycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.)

card.name: Mind Stone
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Mind Stone: Draw a card.

card.name: Mist Raven
card.text: Flying When Mist Raven enters the battlefield, return target creature to its owner's hand.

card.name: Mistmeadow Witch
card.text: {2}{W}{U}: Exile target creature. Return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Moldervine Reclamation
card.text: Whenever a creature you control dies, you gain 1 life and draw a card.

card.name: Momentary Blink
card.text: Exile target creature you control, then return it to the battlefield under its owner's control. Flashback {3}{U} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Mulldrifter
card.text: Flying When Mulldrifter enters the battlefield, draw two cards. Evoke {2}{U} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

card.name: Myriad Landscape
card.text: Myriad Landscape enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {C}. {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Myriad Landscape: Search your library for up to two basic land cards that share a land type, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Nullmage Shepherd
card.text: Tap four untapped creatures you control: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

card.name: Numa, Joraga Chieftain
card.text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may pay {X}{X}. When you do, distribute X +1/+1 counters among any number of target Elves. Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)

card.name: Opal Palace
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity. If you spend this mana to cast your commander, it enters the battlefield with a number of additional +1/+1 counters on it equal to the number of times it's been cast from the command zone this game.

card.name: Pact of the Serpent
card.text: Choose a creature type. Target player draws X cards and loses X life, where X is the number of creatures they control of the chosen type.

card.name: Path of Ancestry
card.text: Path of Ancestry enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity. When that mana is spent to cast a creature spell that shares a creature type with your commander, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

card.name: Poison-Tip Archer
card.text: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.) Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.) Whenever another creature dies, each opponent loses 1 life.

card.name: Pride of the Perfect
card.text: Elves you control get +2/+0.

card.name: Prowess of the Fair
card.text: Whenever another nontoken Elf is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, you may create a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token.

card.name: Putrefy
card.text: Destroy target artifact or creature. It can't be regenerated.

card.name: Ranar the Ever-Watchful
card.text: Flying, vigilance The first card you foretell each turn costs {0} to foretell. Whenever you exile one or more cards from your hand and/or permanents from the battlefield, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

card.name: Reclamation Sage
card.text: When Reclamation Sage enters the battlefield, you may destroy target artifact or enchantment.

card.name: Restoration Angel
card.text: Flash Flying When Restoration Angel enters the battlefield, you may exile target non-Angel creature you control, then return that card to the battlefield under your control.

card.name: Return to Dust
card.text: Exile target artifact or enchantment. If you cast this spell during your main phase, you may exile up to one other target artifact or enchantment.

card.name: Rhys the Exiled
card.text: Whenever Rhys the Exiled attacks, you gain 1 life for each Elf you control. {B}, Sacrifice an Elf: Regenerate Rhys the Exiled.

card.name: Ruthless Winnower
card.text: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player sacrifices a non-Elf creature.

card.name: Sage of the Beyond
card.text: Flying Spells you cast from anywhere other than your hand cost {2} less to cast. Foretell {4}{U} (During your turn, you may pay {2} and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)

card.name: Sea Gate Oracle
card.text: When Sea Gate Oracle enters the battlefield, look at the top two cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the other on the bottom of your library.

card.name: Sejiri Refuge
card.text: Sejiri Refuge enters the battlefield tapped. When Sejiri Refuge enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life. {T}: Add {W} or {U}.

card.name: Serpent's Soul-Jar
card.text: Whenever an Elf you control dies, exile it. {T}, Pay 2 life: Until end of turn, you may cast a creature spell from among cards exiled with Serpent's Soul-Jar.

card.name: Shaman of the Pack
card.text: When Shaman of the Pack enters the battlefield, target opponent loses life equal to the number of Elves you control.

card.name: Sky Diamond
card.text: Sky Diamond enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {U}.

card.name: Sol Ring
card.text: {T}: Add {C}{C}.

card.name: Soulherder
card.text: Whenever a creature is exiled from the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on Soulherder. At the beginning of your end step, you may exile another target creature you control, then return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

card.name: Spectral Deluge
card.text: Return each creature your opponents control with toughness X or less to its owner's hand, where X is the number of Islands you control. Foretell {1}{U}{U} (During your turn, you may pay {2} and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)

card.name: Springbloom Druid
card.text: When Springbloom Druid enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice a land. If you do, search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Stoic Farmer
card.text: When Stoic Farmer enters the battlefield, search your library for a basic Plains card and reveal it. If an opponent controls more lands than you, put it onto the battlefield tapped. Otherwise put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library. Foretell {1}{W} (During your turn, you may pay {2} and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)

card.name: Storm Herd
card.text: Create X 1/1 white Pegasus creature tokens with flying, where X is your life total.

card.name: Sun Titan
card.text: Vigilance Whenever Sun Titan enters the battlefield or attacks, you may return target permanent card with converted mana cost 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Swiftfoot Boots
card.text: Equipped creature has hexproof and haste. Equip {1}

card.name: Sylvan Messenger
card.text: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.) When Sylvan Messenger enters the battlefield, reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all Elf cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Synthetic Destiny
card.text: Exile all creatures you control. At the beginning of the next end step, reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal that many creature cards, put all creature cards revealed this way onto the battlefield, then shuffle the rest of the revealed cards into your library.

card.name: Tales of the Ancestors
card.text: Each player with fewer cards in hand than the player with the most cards in hand draws cards equal to the difference. Foretell {1}{U} (During your turn, you may pay {2} and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)

card.name: Thunderclap Wyvern
card.text: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) Flying Other creatures you control with flying get +1/+1.

card.name: Timberwatch Elf
card.text: {T}: Target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of Elves on the battlefield.

card.name: Tranquil Cove
card.text: Tranquil Cove enters the battlefield tapped. When Tranquil Cove enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life. {T}: Add {W} or {U}.

card.name: Twinblade Assassins
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, if a creature died this turn, draw a card.

card.name: Voice of Many
card.text: When Voice of Many enters the battlefield, draw a card for each opponent who controls fewer creatures than you.

card.name: Voice of the Woods
card.text: Tap five untapped Elves you control: Create a 7/7 green Elemental creature token with trample.

card.name: Wall of Omens
card.text: Defender When Wall of Omens enters the battlefield, draw a card.

card.name: Whirler Rogue
card.text: When Whirler Rogue enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature tokens with flying. Tap two untapped artifacts you control: Target creature can't be blocked this turn.

card.name: Windfall
card.text: Each player discards their hand, then draws cards equal to the greatest number of cards a player discarded this way.

card.name: Wirewood Channeler
card.text: {T}: Add X mana of any one color, where X is the number of Elves on the battlefield.

card.name: Wolverine Riders
card.text: At the beginning of each upkeep, create a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token. Whenever another Elf enters the battlefield under your control, you gain life equal to its toughness.

card.name: Wood Elves
card.text: When Wood Elves enters the battlefield, search your library for a Forest card and put that card onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.
